name: Soy Good Adventures
description:
Soy Good Adventures

Ludum Dare 52

Theme: Harvest

Developed by Bray Cooke | Cookiezznz

A symbol matching card game. Stay alive, match symbols, and harvest the soy!

Mouse Input Only

FAQ:

  1. Can I combine two of the same card?
    1. no
  2. What do Hostile cards do?
    1. They remove one active card in the play area. If you have no cards you take damage!
  3. What can action cards be used on?
    1. Removing Hostile Cards or Completing combinations.
  4. Do you need to match all symbols on a card?
    1. No, only one symbol needs to match to combine cards.
  5. Where's the soy?
    1. Try matching the two soy cards!
